hero.name: Vo Manh Quan
hero.description: I am a software engineer responsible for designing and developing applications and software, primarily using JavaScript. I have over three years of experience in software development, including building, maintaining, and analyzing project requirements for both freelance projects and company-based work.

about.title: Summarize
items: Worked at Napa Global for over a year (now)
Graduated in Frontend programming at IViettech programming center
Good skilled IT with over 3 years' experience including web development, maintenance at both corporate environments and freelance projects.
Experienced in web development, from database to services and user interfaces
Strong problem-solving, ability to debug and understand the existing source code
Have a deep understanding of UI/UX.

objectives.title: Senior Full-stack Engineer
objectives.subtitle: Career Objective
objectives.description: I don't just write code, I build solutions. I focus on clean code, design patterns, and the ability to independently handle a complete feature from database to UI. My goal is to master the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem to create highly scalable, high-performance, and cost-effective web applications.

list.title: Short-term (1-2 Years)
descriptions: I aspire to work and study in a professional environment.
Seeking opportunities to contribute and develop oneself.

list.title: Long-term (3-5 Years)
descriptions: Become Tech Lead, mentor for junior members and participate in product development process (Product Mindset).
Create changes to contribute to the company's growth.

project.description: Delivering scalable web solutions and intuitive user experiences.
project.subDescription: Here are a few projects that define my technical journey.

projects.title: Scout TechFul
projects.subTitle: Japanese Job Platform
projects.description: A high-performance job search platform specifically for the Japanese market. The project focuses on a smooth search experience and optimized SEO capabilities.
features: System architecture with Nuxt 3 ensures SEO and SSR (Server-Side Rendering).
Complex state management (search filters, applications) using Pinia.
Reduces runtime errors by closely applying TypeScript.
Modern and user-friendly interface design with Tailwind CSS.
Performance analysis and optimization using techniques such as code splitting and lazy loading.

projects.title: Carrotcake
projects.subTitle: Al Social Media Manager
projects.description: Built an AI-powered SaaS platform for automated content creation and social media scheduling (Facebook & Instagram).
features: Integrated OpenAI API with a FastAPI backend to deliver intelligent content generation and recommendations.
Implemented a drag-and-drop scheduling system using Next.js for seamless post management.
Developed an automated scheduling workflow to publish posts at optimal times.
Designed a clean, modern UI with Tailwind CSS to enhance usability and user experience.

projects.title: Napa-tools
projects.subTitle: Internal Company Management Platform
projects.description: An internal enterprise management platform that helps companies manage employees, projects, schedules, and operational workflows in a centralized system.
features: Developed modules for HR management, project tracking, meeting room booking, and accounting operations.
IImplemented employee attendance tracking, work schedules (on/off), late check-ins, and request/approval workflows.
Built a responsive and reusable frontend using React.
Designed and implemented a scalable backend with NestJS and PostgreSQL.
Ensured secure, maintainable architecture with role-based access control and clean API design.

projects.title: Trainix
projects.subTitle: Transportation Training Management Platform
projects.description: A web-based platform designed to support transportation training and education management, helping organizations manage courses, learners, and training-related processes efficiently.
features: Developed a modern and reusable frontend using Vue.js, focusing on clean UI structure and smooth user experience.
Designed and implemented the backend using NestJS, handling business logic, data flow, and API architecture.
Built core features for managing training courses, learners, and related educational data.
Designed APIs and data models, ensuring consistent data structures between frontend and backend.
Applied modular architecture, clean code practices, and well-structured API design to ensure scalability, maintainability, and long-term system stability.

items.title: React Ecosystem
items.list: React.js, Next.js (App Router), Redux, React Query, React Hook Form, React Router, Zustand, React big calendar, React Select

items.title: Vue Ecosystem
items.list: Vue 3, Nuxt 3, Pinia, Vuetify, VeeValidate, Swiper

items.title: UI & Styling
items.list: Tailwind CSS, SCSS, Styled component, Figma (for Dev)

items.title: DevOps & Tools
items.list: Docker, Git, Postman, Jest, Jira, Trello

items.title: Workflow & Standards
items.list: Agile/Scrum, Clean Code Principles, RESTful API Design

list.description: A professional product & outsourcing environment, where I significantly developed my system-thinking mindset and teamwork skills.

projects.title: Project: Carrotcake (AI SaaS)
projects.description: Built an AI-integrated social media management tool. Implemented content suggestion engine via OpenAI API and drag-and-drop scheduling features.

projects.title: Project: Napa-tools (Internal ERP)
projects.description: Architected the internal management system (HR, Booking, Accounting). Designed database schema and RESTful APIs for secure data flow.

list.description: Transitioned to an independent working model as a Technical Partner, delivering custom web solutions tailored to client requirements.

projects.title: Project: Scout TechFul
projects.description: A job search platform for the Japanese market. Implemented SEO-friendly architecture with Nuxt 3 and complex state management using Pinia.

projects.title: Project: Trainix
projects.description: A job search platform for the Japanese market. Implemented SEO-friendly architecture with Nuxt 3 and complex state management using Pinia.

projects.description: Contributed to the development of a digital financial information platform, focusing on user interface enhancements and interactive features.

Feel free to reach out if you have a question.
